pageNotFoundSubtitle: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for. Perhaps you’ve mistyped the URL? Be sure to check your spelling.
unauthorizedPageTitle: Unauthorised, Access denied due to invalid credentials
unauthorizedPageSubTitle: Your authorisation failed, Please try again.
serverErrorPageSubTitle: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.
forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email below for the reset link.
changePasswordSubtitle: Enter you old and new passwords in the fields below to change the password
signUpSuccessSubtitle: You have signed up successfully, we have a sent you a mail with the verifcation link.
signInFailSubtitle: The password you entered seems to be incorrect, please try again.
invalidPassword: Password length must be more than 6 characters
emailNotVerified: Your email is not verified. Please verify your email to continue.
resetPasswordSuccessSubtitle: The reset link to reset your password has been sent to your email, use the link to reset your password.
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong while logging in please try again
unVerifiedEmail: Email not verified. Please verify the Email to sign in
invalidErrorCode: Something went wrong. Please try after some time
dataNotFound: Data not found. Please try again after some time
